General.Name: Rio2 Limited
General.Description: Rio2 Limited engages in the exploration, development, and mining of mineral properties in Canada, Peru, Bahamas, and Chile. It holds a 100% in the Fenix Gold Project covering an area of approximately 16,050 hectares located in Chile. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: The Marine Building, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2G8
